PC Japanese (JP): 「…楼座叔母さんもごめんよ。……別に反抗したかったわけじゃない。俺も死にたくないし、親父たちの本当の仇を見つけ出したい。……協調性のないことを言って悪かったぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…楼座叔母さんもごめんよ。……別に反抗したかったわけじゃない。俺も死にたくないし、親父たちの本当の仇を見つけ出したい。……協調性のないことを言って悪かったぜ」
Russian (RU): "...Я извиняюсь, тётя Роза. ......Не то чтобы я хотел противостоять тебе. Я не желаю умирать, поэтому я бы хотел найти настоящих убийц папы и остальных. ......Прости, что наговорил чепухи вместо того, чтобы объединить усилия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...E me desculpe, tia Rosa. ......Não é como se eu quisesse desafiar você.{n}Eu também não quero morrer, e eu quero encontrar o assassino do meu pai e dos outros. ......Desculpe por dizer algo que não foi nada cooperativo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…樓座姑母，也跟您道個歉。……我並不是想反抗姑母。我也不想死，也想找出殺害老爸他們的真正仇人。……抱歉說了些缺乏合作性的話。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…楼座姑母，也跟您道个歉。……我并不是想反抗姑母。我也不想死，也想找出杀害老爸他们的真正仇人。……抱歉说了些缺乏合作性的话。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... E mi dispiace, Rosa oba-san. ... Non è che volevo oppormi a te. È solo che non voglio morire, quindi volevo trovare il vero nemico di Papà e gli altri. ... Scusa per aver detto qualcosa di poco cooperativo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...E mi dispiace, zia Rosa... Non intendevo contestarti... È che non voglio morire, e desidero trovare il vero responsabile di ciò che è successo al mio vecchio e agli altri... Scusami per aver parlato in maniera controproducente."
Turkish (TR): "...Ve Rosa Teyze, üzgünüm. ......Sana karşı gelmek istediğimden falan değil. Ben de ölmek istemiyorum ve babamla diğerlerinin gerçek katilini bulmak istiyorum. ......İşbirliğine uygun olmayan bir şey söylediğim için özür dilerim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "...No, it's okay. I was also a little rash. Let's make up. As an aunt and nephew, we have to stay on good terms. ......Right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......No, it's alright. I was also a little rash. Let's make up. As auntie and nephew, we have to be friendly with each other. ............Right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......No, it's alright. I was also a little rash. Let's make up. As an aunt and nephew, we have to be friendly with each other. ............Right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……うぅん、いいの。私も、少し軽率だったわ。仲直りしましょう。叔母と甥同士、仲良くしないと。…………ね？」
Russian (RU): "......Нет, всё в порядке. Я тоже слегка погорячилась. Забудем разногласия. Как тёте и племяннику, нам нужно быть дружнее друг с другом. ............Верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não, tudo bem. Eu também fui um pouco dura. Vamos fazer as pazes. Como tia e sobrinho, nós precisamos nos dar bem um com o outro. ............Certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……沒事，沒關係的。我也稍微有點輕率了。來和好吧。姑母與侄兒，不相親相愛可不行。…………對吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……没事，没关系的。我也稍微有点轻率了。来和好吧。姑母与侄儿，不相亲相爱可不行。…………对吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... No, è tutto a posto. Anche io sono stata avventata. Facciamo la pace. {n}Come zia e nipote, dobbiamo essere amichevoli. ... Giusto?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...No, è tutto a posto. Anch'io sono stata un po' brusca. Facciamo la pace. Zia e nipote devono andare entrambi d'accordo... Giusto?"
Turkish (TR): "......Hayır, sorun değil. Ben de biraz aceleci davrandım. Hadi barışalım. Teyze ve yeğen olarak birbirimizle iyi geçinmek zorundayız. ............Değil mi?"

Steam (ST): Aunt Rosa shifted the gun to one hand and held out her other.
Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Rosa shifted the gun to one hand, and held out her other hand.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa oba-san shifted the gun to one hand, and held out her other hand.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座叔母さんは銃を片手で持ち直すと、空いた手で握手を求めてくる。
Russian (RU): Тётя Роза переложила ружьё в одну руку, и протянула другую.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Rosa passou a arma para a outra mão, e estendeu a mão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座姑母換了個單手拿槍的姿勢，把空出的手伸了過來，希望與我握手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座姑母换了个单手拿枪的姿势，把空出的手伸了过来，希望与我握手。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rosa oba-san prese la pistola con una mano, e tese l'altra.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Zia Rosa prese il fucile con una mano sola, e tese l'altra in segno di riconciliazione...
Turkish (TR): Rosa Teyze silahı bir eline aldı ve diğer elini uzattı.

Steam (ST): ...I reached out, and for the time being, we shook hands.
Umineko Project (UP): ...I reached out, and for the time being, we shook hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …俺はそれに手を差し出し、とりあえずの握手をする。
Russian (RU): ...Я протянул свою, и мы обменялись рукопожатием.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eu estendi a mão, e naquele momento, nós demos as mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我也伸出手去，總之是握了下手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我也伸出手去，总之是握了下手。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io tesi la mia, e ce le stringemmo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Io allungai la mia, e le stringemmo in una stretta subito dopo.
Turkish (TR): ...Ben de elimi uzattım ve bir süreliğine el sıkıştık.

Steam (ST): Aunt Rosa's gaze was sharp. ...In order to deny the witch, she would sacrifice anyone. ...That's what her eyes told me.
Umineko Project (UP): Auntie's gaze was sharp.{n}......In order to deny the witch, she would make anyone a sacrifice.{n}...That's what her eyes told me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Oba-san's gaze was sharp.......In order to deny the witch, she would make anyone a sacrifice. ...That's what her eyes told me.
PC Japanese (JP): 叔母さんのその眼光は鋭い。……魔女を否定するためなら、誰だって生贄にする。…目がそう言っている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 叔母さんのその眼光は鋭い。{n}……魔女を否定するためなら、誰だって生贄にする。{n}…目がそう言っている。
Russian (RU): Взгляд Тёти был острым и холодным.{n}......Для того чтобы опровергнуть ведьму, она любого была готова принести в жертву.{n}...Вот что мне поведали её глаза.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O olhar dela estava afiado.{n}......A fim de negar a bruxa, ela poderia fazer de qualquer um, um sacrifício.{n}...Era isso o que seus olhos me diziam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 姑母的目光十分銳利。{n}……為了否定魔女，任何人都可以當作犧牲品。{n}…她的眼睛在如此訴說著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 姑母的目光十分锐利。{n}……为了否定魔女，任何人都可以当作牺牲品。{n}…她的眼睛在如此诉说着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): oba-san aguzzò lo sguardo. ... Per negare la strega, sarebbe stata pronta a sacrificare tutti. ... Questo è ciò che i suoi occhi mi dissero.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Negli occhi della zia vidi una scintilla ardente...{n}Per negare la strega, avrebbe sacrificato chiunque...{n}Questo era ciò che diceva il suo sguardo.
Turkish (TR): Teyzemin bakışları keskindi.{n}......Cadıyı inkâr etmek uğruna herkesi kurban edebilirdi.{n}...Gözleri bana bunu söylüyordu.

Steam (ST): And me...? I denied the witch. ...But I wasn't prepared to lose anything.
Umineko Project (UP): And me...?{n}I denied the witch.{n}......But I wasn't prepared to lose anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And me...? I denied the witch.......But I wasn't prepared to lose anything.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は…？魔女は否定する。……でも、何も失う覚悟がない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺は…？{n}魔女は否定する。{n}……でも、何も失う覚悟がない。
Russian (RU): А я?..{n}Я отрицал ведьму.{n}......Но я не был готов потерять кого‐либо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E eu...?{n}Eu neguei a bruxa.{n}......Mas eu não estava preparado para perder nada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而我呢…？{n}我否定魔女。{n}……但是，我卻什麼都不想失去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而我呢…？{n}我否定魔女。{n}……但是，我却什么都不想失去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E io...? Io ho negato la strega. ... Ma non ero preparato a perdere qualcosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E io...?{n}Io avevo negato la strega...{n}Ma non ero pronto a perdere nulla.
Turkish (TR): Peki ya ben...?{n}Cadıyı inkâr ettim.{n}......Ama hiçbir şey kaybetmeye hazır değildim.

Steam (ST): I was probably the one who seemed to be fighting the most, ...and yet, the one who was most separated from reality.
Umineko Project (UP): I was probably the one who thought himself most ready to fight, ......and the one standing furthest from the truth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was probably the one most ready to fight, ......and the one most separated from reality.
PC Japanese (JP): 多分俺は、一番戦っているようなつもりでいて、……一番真実から遠い場所にいる。
Russian (RU): Вероятно я был одним из наиболее подготовленных к борьбе... и одним из наиболее оторванных от реальности.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu provavelmente fui o único que pensou que estava pronto para lutar, ......e aquele que estava mais distante da verdade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我大概，是最以為自己在與魔女正面交鋒，……卻又身處距離真相最為遙遠的位置。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我大概，是最以为自己在与魔女正面交锋，……却又身处距离真相最为遥远的位置。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ero probabilmente il più pronto a combattere... e quello più separato dalla realtà.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Probabilmente ero il più preparato a combattere... ed ero quello meno a contatto con la realtà.
Turkish (TR): Muhtemelen kendini savaşmaya en hazır sanan, ......ve gerçeklerden de en uzak olan kişi bendim.
